subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Mets deliberated whether to keep 11 or 12 pitchers, and in the end they went with Ambiorix Burgos, a true reliever, and not starting pitcher Chan Ho Park.
snippet: The Mets deliberated whether to keep 11 or 12 pitchers, and in the end they went with Ambiorix Burgos, a true reliever, and not starting pitcher Chan Ho Park.
